rooms.description: An open living area with large floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light, designed in a Scandinavian aesthetic with minimalist decor and neutral colors.
A dining area adjacent to the living room, featuring a sleek Scandinavian design with light wood accents and floor-to-ceiling windows on one side.
A modern Scandinavian kitchen with streamlined cabinetry and integrated storage, optimized for functionality and aesthetics.
The master bedroom features ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows and a Scandinavian minimalist design. An adjacent ensuite bathroom is provided for convenience.
A cozy second bedroom designed with a Scandinavian aesthetic, ideal for family members in the joint family setting.
A dedicated home office space designed to ensure productivity and privacy, with floor-to-ceiling windows for ample light.
An integrated space for dining and cooking that maximizes the use of natural lighting from floor-to-ceiling windows.
A multi-purpose storage area integrated into the floor plan for efficient space utilization.

openings.description: A modern Scandinavian door integrated with a glass panel to ensure seamless transition and ample light.
Floor-to-ceiling windows providing natural light and enhancing the open feel of the interior spaces.

swimming_pool.description: A Scandinavian-designed swimming pool featuring minimalist aesthetics and complementing the open spaces of the cottage.

vastu_principles.layout_alignment: Aligned with Vastu Shastra principles to promote positive energy flow.
vastu_principles.note: Adhered to local building norms, ensuring safety and compliance with Indian residential design standards.

plot_details.description: A well-planned layout maximizing the use of space on a 30x50 feet plot in an urban/suburban setting suitable for a joint family.
